loginGetUser: select id from user where name = ? and password = password(?)
getUserToken: select token from user_login where user_id = ? and date_add(date_created, INTERVAL ? DAY) >= now()
getUserByToken: select user_id from user_login where token = ? and date_add(date_created, INTERVAL ? DAY) >= now()
createToken: INSERT INTO pantax.user_login (user_id, token, date_created) VALUES(?, uuid(), now())
getTokenById: select token from pantax.user_login where id = ?
